languages.text: "Знаете, ван Калокс... мы с вами не всегда ладили, но... как оказалось, ваша персона рядом с Лорд-капитаном была далеко не самой худшей кандидатурой..."
"You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."
languages.original_text: "Знаете, ван Калокс... мы с вами не всегда ладили, но... как оказалось, ваша персона рядом с Лорд-капитаном была далеко не самой худшей кандидатурой..."

traits.locale_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."
"You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."
"You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."
"You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

languages.text: “你很清楚，冯·卡洛克斯……虽然我们时常意见相左，不过……若是一定要选出某个人陪在舰长大人身边的话，你绝不是最差的人选……”
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: “你很清楚，冯·卡洛克斯……虽然我们时常意见相左，不过……若是一定要选出某个人陪在舰长大人身边的话，你绝不是最差的人选……”

languages.text: « Vous savez, van Calox... Même si vous et moi n'avons pas toujours été d'accord... {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} aurait pu finir avec bien pire que vous... »
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, van Calox... Même si vous et moi n'avons pas toujours été d'accord... {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} aurait pu finir avec bien pire que vous... »

languages.text: «¿Sabe, van Calox?... Usted y yo hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero... si debe haber alguien junto a la Lord Capitán, usted dista mucho de ser el peor candidato...».
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe, van Calox?... Usted y yo hemos tenido nuestras diferencias, pero... si debe haber alguien junto a la Lord Capitán, usted dista mucho de ser el peor candidato...».

languages.text: 「あの、ヴァン・カロックス…我々は必ずしも意見が一致してきたわけではないが…ロード・キャプテンの味方としては、あなたは最悪の候補者とは言えない…」
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: 「あの、ヴァン・カロックス…我々は必ずしも意見が一致してきたわけではないが…ロード・キャプテンの味方としては、あなたは最悪の候補者とは言えない…」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, van Calox ... wir waren nicht immer einer Meinung, aber ... wenn jemand an der Seite des Lord Captains stehen muss, seid Ihr sicherlich nicht der schlimmste Kandidat ..."
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, van Calox ... wir waren nicht immer einer Meinung, aber ... wenn jemand an der Seite des Lord Captains stehen muss, seid Ihr sicherlich nicht der schlimmste Kandidat ..."

languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

languages.text: "Yani van Calox... Seninle yıldızımız pek barışmadı, biliyorsun ama Lord Kaptan'ın yanında illa biri olacaktıysa... Senin olmanda bir beis görmüyordum."
languages.original_text: "You know, van Calox... you and I have not always seen eye to eye, but... if there must be someone standing at the Lord Captain's side, you were far from the worst candidate..."

traits.locale_text: "Yani van Calox... Seninle yıldızımız pek barışmadı, biliyorsun ama Lord Kaptan'ın yanında illa biri olacaktıysa... Senin olmanda bir beis görmüyordum."
